items.title: One hundred abducted schoolchildren released in Nigeria
items.description: Details of the release of the schoolchildren are still unclear and 165 people remain unaccounted for.

items.title: Thousands flee Thai-Cambodia border after deadly clashes
items.description: At least five people have been killed in the most serious confrontation between both sides since July.

items.title: Thieves snatch eight Matisse artworks from library in Brazil
items.description: The thieves enter the library in normal opening hours, stuffing the art works into a canvas bag.

items.title: Syrians share their thoughts one year on from the fall of Assad
items.description: The BBC's Middle East correspondent Hugo Bachega speaks to Syrians about how life has changed since the revolution.

items.title: Woman who blackmailed Son Heung-min gets four years in jail
items.description: The woman claiming she was carrying the ex-Tottenham captain's child and extorted $200,000 from him.
